name: graded
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
grade
C1 to separate people or things into different levels of quality, size, importance, etc.: The fruit is washed and then graded by size. The books are graded according to the difficulty of the language.
C1 US (UK mark) to give a score to a student's piece of work: to grade work/papers
